How many people are affected by white sponge nevus ?,"The exact prevalence of white sponge nevus is unknown, but it is estimated to affect less than 1 in 200,000 individuals worldwide.",GHR,white sponge nevus
What are the genetic changes related to white sponge nevus ?,"Mutations in the KRT4 or KRT13 gene cause white sponge nevus. These genes provide instructions for making proteins called keratins. Keratins are a group of tough, fibrous proteins that form the structural framewor
